None.Name: Infused Infiltration
None.Description: Activate to teleport the unit to a hostile structure within a 50m range. Cards can no longer be played out next to it once the unit has been teleported. At its new position it will explode after 10 seconds dealing 255 damage to hostile structures in a 20m radius, up to 765 total. Knocks back small units.
